definition: house with more than 1 story/storied building/floor/CL:層|层[ceng2],座[zuo4],棟|栋[dong4]

sentences.english: Reinstatement cost of the building or mortgaged loan amount required by the Bank.
sentences.chinese: 楼宇建筑之重建费或银行指定之按揭金额。

sentences.english: Building integrated wiring on-site installation supervision and commissioning.
sentences.chinese: 监督楼宇综合布线实地安装和试运行。

sentences.english: Of them, 735 complaints involved building management.
sentences.chinese: 其中，有关楼宇管理的贪污举报735宗。

sentences.english: The purchaser signing the subscription document must be cautious and avoid falling into the trap.
sentences.chinese: 购买人签定楼宇认购书应谨防误入陷阱。

sentences.english: The accident took place on a site where a 25-storey building was to be demolished.
sentences.chinese: 意外现场为一幢清拆中的楼宇，楼高25层。

sentences.english: Yet the building standards are not retrospective.
sentences.chinese: 然而，建筑标准对已建的楼宇是无效的。

sentences.english: Building safety is another issue which is very close to Mrs Lam's heart.
sentences.chinese: 楼宇安全是另一个郑女士十分关注的问题。

sentences.english: Is one square foot more important than one person?
sentences.chinese: 一方平呎的楼宇面积重要过一个人吗？

sentences.english: Now empty buildings are sprouting across the mainland.
sentences.chinese: 如今，中国大陆到处是空置的楼宇。

sentences.english: You let me in the barren land, and constructing high buildings.
sentences.chinese: 你让我在贫瘠的土地上，盖起了高高的楼宇。

sentences.english: The old buildings of University of Leeds- School of Design.
sentences.chinese: 利兹大学纺织学院古老的楼宇。

sentences.english: The combination of low interest rates and low prices made people more willing to buy on the private market.
sentences.chinese: 低息加上低楼价可提升买楼意欲，刺激私人楼宇市场。

sentences.english: Rehabilitation (of buildings), e. g. Blue House at Stone Nullah Lane in Wanchai.
sentences.chinese: 维修楼宇，例如湾仔石水渠街的蓝屋。

sentences.english: User of the high-rise building shall comply with these provisions.
sentences.chinese: 高屋楼宇内各用户，均应遵守本规定。

sentences.english: We will review the ambit of loan funds for building safety.
sentences.chinese: 我们会检讨各个有关楼宇安全贷款基金的适用范围。

sentences.english: Where to look at that clear smoke buildings?

definition: building (a relatively large, multi-storey one)/CL:幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]
a building of two or more stories/CL:棟|栋[dong4],幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]
